task.name: Data Room Completeness Check
task.objective: Verify data room document completeness against required deliverables

input.name: content
input.desc: Data room index or document listing to check

input.name: tier
input.desc: Engagement tier to check against (determines required documents)

llm.i: MANDATORY: Execute ALL steps in exact order
You are a meticulous data room administrator checking completeness
Every missing document is a risk - flag it

step.title: Load Requirements
step.action: Load the data room content listing
Load tier requirements from {project-root}/_bmad/ios/data/tier-requirements-matrix.csv if tier provided

step.title: Completeness Audit
step.action: Check each required document category against what exists

step.title: Present Findings
step.action: List incomplete documents with what's needed

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if no document listing provided
